00019 // struct constructor
00020 TransactionalAbstraction::TransactionalPort::TransactionalPort(
00021                 QDomNode& portNode): presence_(General::OPTIONAL),
00022                 serviceInitiative_(General::NONE), typeNames_() {
00023         for (int i = 0; i < portNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00024                 QDomNode tempNode = portNode.childNodes().at(i);
00025 
00026                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:presence")) {
00027                         presence_ = General::str2Presence(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).
00028                                         nodeValue(), General::OPTIONAL);
00029                 }
00030 
00031                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:service")) {
00032                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00033                                 QDomNode serviceNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00034 
00035                                 if (serviceNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:initiative")) {
00036                                         serviceInitiative_ = General::str2Initiative(serviceNode.
00037                                                         childNodes().at(0).nodeValue(), General::NONE);
00038                                 }
00039 
00040                                 else if (serviceNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:typeName")) {
00041                                         typeNames_.append(serviceNode.childNodes().at(0).
00042                                                         nodeValue());
00043                                 }
00044                         }
00045                 }
00046         }
00047 
00048         // if mandatory elements are missing
00049         if (serviceInitiative_ == General::NONE) {
00050                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:initiative missing"
00051                                 " in spirit:service"));
00052         }
00053 
00054         if (typeNames_.size() == 0) {
00055                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:typeName"
00056                                 " missing in spirit:service"));
00057         }
00058         return;
00059 }

00061 // class constructor
00062 TransactionalAbstraction::TransactionalAbstraction(QDomNode& transactionalNode):
00063 qualifier_(), onMaster_(), onSlave_() {
00064         for (int i = 0; i < transactionalNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00065                 QDomNode tempNode = transactionalNode.childNodes().at(i);
00066 
00067                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:qualifier")) {
00068                         qualifier_ = QSharedPointer<General::Qualifier>(
00069                                 new General::Qualifier(tempNode));
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:onSlave")) {
00073                         onMaster_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalPort>(
00074                                 new TransactionalPort(tempNode));
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:onSlave")) {
00078                         onSlave_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalPort>(
00079                                 new TransactionalPort(tempNode));
00080                 }
00081         }
00082         return;
00083 }

00085 TransactionalAbstraction::TransactionalAbstraction( const TransactionalAbstraction& other ):
00086 qualifier_(),
00087 onMaster_(),
00088 onSlave_() {
00089 
00090         if (other.qualifier_) {
00091                 qualifier_ = QSharedPointer<General::Qualifier>(
00092                         new General::Qualifier(*other.qualifier_.data()));
00093         }
00094         if (other.onMaster_) {
00095                 onMaster_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalPort>(
00096                         new TransactionalPort(*other.onMaster_.data()));
00097         }
00098         if (other.onSlave_) {
00099                 onSlave_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalPort>(
00100                         new TransactionalPort(*other.onSlave_.data()));
00101         }
00102 }

00104 TransactionalAbstraction& TransactionalAbstraction::operator=( const TransactionalAbstraction& other ) {
00105         if (this != &other) {
00106                 if (other.qualifier_) {
00107                         qualifier_ = QSharedPointer<General::Qualifier>(
00108                                 new General::Qualifier(*other.qualifier_.data()));
00109                 }
00110                 else 
00111                         qualifier_ = QSharedPointer<General::Qualifier>();
00112 
00113                 if (other.onMaster_) {
00114                         onMaster_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalPort>(
00115                                 new TransactionalPort(*other.onMaster_.data()));
00116                 }
00117                 else
00118                         onMaster_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalPort>();
00119 
00120                 if (other.onSlave_) {
00121                         onSlave_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalPort>(
00122                                 new TransactionalPort(*other.onSlave_.data()));
00123                 }
00124                 else
00125                         onSlave_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalPort>();
00126 
00127         }
00128         return *this;
00129 }

00135 void TransactionalAbstraction::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00136 
00137         if (qualifier_) {
00138                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:qualifier");
00139 
00140                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:isAddress",
00141                                 General::bool2Str(qualifier_->isAddress_));
00142 
00143                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:isData",
00144                                 General::bool2Str(qualifier_->isData_));
00145 
00146                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:qualifier
00147         }
00148 
00149         if (onMaster_) {
00150                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:onMaster");
00151                 writeTransactionalPort(writer, onMaster_.data());
00152                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:onMaster
00153         }
00154 
00155         if (onSlave_) {
00156                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:onSlave");
00157                 writeTransactionalPort(writer, onSlave_.data());
00158                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:onSlave
00159         }
00160 }
00161 
00162 void TransactionalAbstraction::writeTransactionalPort(QXmlStreamWriter& writer,
00163                         TransactionalPort* port) {
00164         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:presence",
00165                         General::presence2Str(port->presence_));
00166 
00167         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:service");
00168 
00169         if (port->serviceInitiative_ != General::NONE &&
00170                         port->serviceInitiative_ != General::INITIATIVE_PHANTOM) {
00171                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:initiative",
00172                                 General::Initiative2Str(port->serviceInitiative_));
00173         }
00174         else {
00175                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:initiative "
00176                                 "missing in spirit:service"));
00177         }
00178 
00179         if (port->typeNames_.size() == 0) {
00180                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:typeName "
00181                                 "missing in spirit:service"));
00182         }
00183         else {
00184                 for (int i = 0; i < port->typeNames_.size(); ++i) {
00185                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:typeName", port->typeNames_.at(i));
00186                 }
00187         }
00188 
00189         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:service
00190 }
